p: Inhibition zones of different crude T. simplex extracts against five pathogenic bacteria were tested using agar gel diffusion assay [ 3, 18]. As a positive control, the broad-spectrum antibiotic levofloxacin was used; as a negative control, DMSO was used. After 24 h of incubation, diameters of inhibition zones were measured for each extract ( Table 3). No crude extract showed antibacterial activity against the tested strains.
